title: FEATURE JOBS: WOTSO, Walker Books Australia, House of CB, Square Keg + More
text:
WOTSO are recruiting for a Community Manager – Sales (SYD) with previous experience in sales and customer service, especially in retail or hospitality environments. If you’ve got an eye for detail, a passion for customer service and the drive to get the job done, apply now.

Walker Books Australia are hiring for a Social Media/Online Community Co-ordinator (SYD) to be responsible for the daily management of Walker Books’s online community promoting their books, authors, events and company. Find out more.

House of CB seek a Retail Concession Manager (SYD) who is confident, vibrant and has a love for fashion. You’ll act as a Brand Ambassador for House of CB and deliver the very highest standards of customer service. Check it out.

Square Keg are looking for a Sales & Brand Representative (BRIS) to manage customer relationships, develop new business and drive volume and distribution growth across the Brisbane region. Additionally, you will be involved in brand events and festivals as required. Apply now.

Want more great job opportunities? Here you go:

Meshki are on the hunt for a Senior Graphic Designer (SYD) to develop country-specific visual communications with a consistent brand tone of voice across all on and offline channels. Check it out.

HUSH Communications are recruiting for a PR Account Manager (SYD) with 5+ years of PR account management experience. Find out more.

The Creative Store are hiring for an Account Director (MEL) to act as a leader in the business and ensure best practice across account services. Apply now.
